name: Hentai Milena
description:
"Hentai Milena" is a unique puzzle in which the image is divided into 8, 32, 50 pieces and the player should move the puzzle pieces of the playing field to restore the original image.
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/3GIF.gif
This is a simple, exciting game that requires logical thinking and the ability to plan your actions.

Features of the game:
  • Achievements;
  • Mode "GOD";
  • Difficulty levels;
  • Relaxing and romantic music.

Enjoy the game process to reproduce photos of beautiful girls and relax with relaxing music. The game also has a "GOD" mode, try it if you are tired of collecting puzzles.
